mapper.insert: insert into item (title, link, image, lprice, hprice, mallName, productId, productType, brand, maker, category1, category2, category3, category4) VALUE (#{title}, #{link}, #{image}, #{lprice}, #{hprice}, #{mallName}, #{productId}, #{productType}, #{brand}, #{maker}, #{category1}, #{category2}, #{category3}, #{category4})
